newsitem.title: USA: Praxair Inc Q4 shr rises.
newsitem.headline: Praxair Inc Q4 shr rises.

text.p: (Millions of dollars, except per share data)

NOTE: 1996 periods include losses from currency translation effects worldwide. 1996 Q4 sales were cut by $22 million, operating profit was cut by $7 million and net income was cut by $4 million compared to the 1995 pro forma results.
1996 year sales were cut by $101 million, operating profit was cut by $23 million and net income by $13 million by effects from currency translation.

(b) Pro forma results reflect acquisition of CBI Industries as though it occurred at January 1, 1995 after adjustments for impact of interest on acquisition debt, increased depreciation and amortization to reflect purchase price allocation, and elimination of assets held for sale.
(c) The quarter and year ended December 31, 1996, includes $7 million and $22 million, respectively, in Selling,
general and administrative costs associated with
(d) The 1996 first quarter CBI integration charges are related to the integration of CBI's Liquid Carbonic business into Praxair; primarily severance and lease termination costs.
The 1995 CBI special charges primarily relate to legal,
environmental and other matters of CBI's Liquid Carbonic
(e) Excluding the effect of the first quarter CBI integration charges, income taxes for the year ended December 31, 1996 were $140 million (26.1% effective tax rate).
(f) Based on 163,472,983 and 159,037,716 shares for the quarter and year ended December 31, 1996 (145,987,724 and 144,147,469 shares for the quarter and year ended December 31, 1995).
